Bedford Institute of Oceanography - Ellis Building Envelope Restoration
================================}}}_builder _

### Official Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS4435816206
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4435816206
*   **Publication Date**: February 19, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 5, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 29, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Construction and Building
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Region of Opportunity**: Nova Scotia
*   **Region of Delivery**: Nova Scotia

#### Project Description

The Bedford Institute of Oceanography - Ellis Building Envelope Restoration project is a two-phase process. Phase One will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, while Phase Two will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.

The work under this contract includes, but is not limited to:

*   Construction services for the repair and restoration of the Ellis Building Envelope at the main entrance vestibule of the Bedford Institute of Oceanography in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
*   Masonry
*   Metals
*   Wood, plastics, and composite materials
*   Openings
*   Thermal and moisture protection
*   Finishes

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Kate Mintzer
*   **Email**: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Inquiry Submission**: All inquiries should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least five calendar days prior to the tender closing date to allow sufficient time to respond.
